answers.answer: A bit..  just scheduled the c section. ..Feb 29th.
Yes definitely :( I've got 11 weeks to go. Nerves are staring to get the best of me.
It's So scary. It's the not knowing when it's going to happen
Give it a few more weeks and then it'll turn into....can't it happen already,  I'm over this! Lol I was that way once I hit about 37 weeks last pregnancy.
Yes!! But for more its more than labor its all the what ifs-what if something is wrong,what if something happens to the baby ,what if what if what if- anxiety bad!!

Yes. I am having a lot of what ifs as well. Specially after being diagnosed with gestational diabetes and not able to bring it down to less than 120, I am starting to have much more concerns. I really hope baby is well and comes out on its time happy and healthy. All the best to all you wonderful mommas too.
Is58, what are they giving you to help your blood sugar? I was just diagnosed with gd and go in today to learn to use the equipment.

Ok went to the class. ..try taking a carb off of each meal and see if that helps. Also make sure you have absolutely no fruit juice. Limit your fruits. Not sure how a typical day looks for you and your meals. Also was told not to go more than 4 hours without eating....and are you waiting 2 hours after eating to test?
I think it's the not knowing when it's going to happen. With my first child I had a bad labour so I think that's why I'm dreading it so much :(
Yes, the what if's, ftm, and doing it alone since the husband decided we were not for him...
Same boat. And the child birth education classes made it worse. Knowing i have a breech baby made the condition worser.. but hopefully lets all cross the stage smoothly. <3
For gdm i am diet controlled with exercises or brisk walk for 15 mins after every meals and cutting down processed sugar and processed food helps a lot.
Yeah I'm a first time mom and I'm freaking out about scenarios that what happen lol

question: any body else starting to freak out about the labour? I'm starting to loose a lot of sleep over it now. :(
title: Feeling anxious
